posts.title: Hello, Layout! ; Visualizing Memory in CuTe
posts.description: Understanding CuTe Layouts: how shape and stride turn flat memory into multidimensional grids.

posts.title: The Art of Slicing ; Partitioning Data Across Blocks and Threads
